GK19kalrs_pu:4: maṇiprakārāḥ sarasaṃ ca candanaṃ śucau priye yānti janasya sevyatām // KalRs_1.2 //
GK19kalrs_pu:6: sutantrigītaṃ madanasya dīpanaṃ śucau niśīthe 'nubhavanti kāminaḥ // KalRs_1.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:8: śiroruhaiḥ snānakaṣāyavāsitaiḥ striyo nidāghaṃ śamayanti kāminām // KalRs_1.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:10: pade pade haṃsarutānukāribhir janasya cittaṃ kriyate samanmatham // KalRs_1.5 //
GK19kalrs_pu:12: nitambadeśāśca sahemamekhalāḥ prakurvate kasya mano na sotsukam // KalRs_1.6 //
GK19kalrs_pu:14: staneṣu tanvaṃśukamunnatastanā niveśayanti pramadāḥ sayauvanāḥ // KalRs_1.7 //
GK19kalrs_pu:16: savallakīkākaligītanisvanair vibodhyate supta ivādya manmathaḥ // KalRs_1.8 //
GK19kalrs_pu:17: siteṣu harmyeṣu niśāsu yoṣitāṃ sukhaprasuptāni mukhāni candramāḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:18: vilokya nūnaṃ bhṛśamutsukaściraṃ niśākṣaye yāti hriyeva pāṇḍutām // KalRs_1.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:20: na śakyate draṣṭumapi pravāsibhiḥ priyāviyogānaladagdhamānasaiḥ // KalRs_1.10 //
GK19kalrs_pu:21: mṛgāḥ pracaṇḍātapatāpitā bhṛśaṃ tṛṣā mahatyā pariśuṣkatālavaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:22: vanāntare toyamiti pradhāvitā nirīkṣya bhinnāñjanasaṃnibhaṃ nabhaḥ // KalRs_1.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:24: anaṅgasaṃdīpanamāśu kurvate yathā pradoṣāḥ śaśicārubhūṣaṇāḥ // KalRs_1.12 //
GK19kalrs_pu:25: ravermayūkhair abhitāpito bhṛśaṃ vidahyamānaḥ pathi taptapāṃsubhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:26: avāṅmukho jihmagatiḥ śvasanmuhuḥ phaṇī mayūrasya tale niṣīdati // KalRs_1.13 //
GK19kalrs_pu:30: pravṛddhatṛṣṇopahatā jalārthino na dantinaḥ kesariṇo 'pi bibhyati // KalRs_1.15 //
GK19kalrs_pu:32: na bhoginaṃ ghnanti samīpavartinaṃ kalāpacakreṣu niveśitānanam // KalRs_1.16 //
GK19kalrs_pu:34: ravermayūkhairabhitāpito bhṛśaṃ varāhayūtho viśatīva bhūtalam // KalRs_1.17 //
GK19kalrs_pu:36: utplutya bhekastṛṣitasya bhoginaḥ phaṇātapatrasya tale niṣīdati // KalRs_1.18 //
GK19kalrs_pu:40: viṣāgnisūryātapatāpitaḥ phaṇī na hanti maṇḍūkakulaṃ tṛṣākulaḥ // KalRs_1.20 //
GK19kalrs_pu:42: tṛṣākulaṃ niḥsṛtamadrigahvarād avekṣamāṇaṃ mahiṣīkulaṃ jalam // KalRs_1.21 //
GK19kalrs_pu:44: dinakaraparitāpakṣīṇatoyāḥ samantād vidadhati bhayamuccair vīkṣyamāṇā vanāntāḥ // KalRs_1.22 //
GK19kalrs_pu:45: śvasiti vihagavargaḥ śīrṇaparṇadrumasthaḥ kapikulamupayāti klāntamadrer nikuñjam /
GK19kalrs_pu:46: bhramati gavayayūthaḥ sarvatastoyamicchañ śarabhakulamajihmaṃ proddharatyambu kūpāt // KalRs_1.23 //
GK19kalrs_pu:48: taṭaviṭapalatāgrāliṅganavyākulena diśi diśi paridagdhā bhūmayaḥ pāvakena // KalRs_1.24 //
GK19kalrs_pu:49: jvalati pavanavṛddhaḥ parvatānāṃ darīṣu sphuṭati paṭuninādaiḥ śuṣkavaṃśasthalīṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:50: prasarati tṛṇamadhye labdhavṛddhiḥ kṣaṇena glapayati mṛgavargaṃ prāntalagno davāgniḥ // KalRs_1.25 //
GK19kalrs_pu:51: bahutara iva jātaḥ śālmalīnāṃ vaneṣu sphurati kanakagauraḥ koṭareṣu drumāṇām /
GK19kalrs_pu:53: gajagavayamṛgendrā vahnisaṃtaptadehāḥ suhṛda iva sametā dvaṃdvabhāvaṃ vihāya /
GK19kalrs_pu:54: hutavahaparikhedād āśu nirgatya kakṣād vipulapulinadeśāṃ nimnagāṃ saṃviśanti // KalRs_1.27 //
GK19kalrs_pu:56: vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena // KalRs_1.28 //
GK19kalrs_pu:59: samāgato rājavad uddhatadyutir ghanāgamaḥ kāmijanapriyaḥ priye // KalRs_2.1 //
GK19kalrs_pu:61: kvacitsagarbhapramadāstanaprabhaiḥ samācitaṃ vyoma ghanaiḥ samantataḥ // KalRs_2.2 //
GK19kalrs_pu:63: prayānti mandaṃ bahudhāravarṣiṇo balāhakāḥ śrotramanoharasvanāḥ // KalRs_2.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:65: sutīkṣṇadhārāpatanograsāyakais tudanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ pravāsinām // KalRs_2.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:71: striyaḥ suduṣṭā iva jātivibhramāḥ prayānti nadyastvaritaṃ payonidhim // KalRs_2.7 //
GK19kalrs_pu:73: vanāni vaindhyāni haranti mānasaṃ vibhūṣitānyudgatapallavair drumaiḥ // KalRs_2.8 //
GK19kalrs_pu:75: samācitā saikatinī vanasthalī samutsukatvaṃ prakaroti cetasaḥ // KalRs_2.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:79: kṛtāparādhānapi yoṣitaḥ priyān pariṣvajante śayane nirantaram // KalRs_2.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:81: nirastamālyābharaṇānulepanāḥ sthitā nirāśāḥ pramadāḥ pravāsinām // KalRs_2.12 //
GK19kalrs_pu:83: sasādhvasairbhekakulair nirīkṣitaṃ prayāti nimnābhimukhaṃ navodakam // KalRs_2.13 //
GK19kalrs_pu:84: vipattrapuṣpāṃ nalinīṃ samutsukā vihāya bhṛṅgāḥ śrutihārinisvanāḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:85: patanti mūḍhāḥ śikhināṃ pranṛtyatāṃ kalāpacakreṣu navotpalāśayā // KalRs_2.14 //
GK19kalrs_pu:87: kapoladeśā vimalotpalaprabhāḥ sabhṛṅgayūthair madavāribhiś citāḥ // KalRs_2.15 //
GK19kalrs_pu:89: pravṛttanṛtyaiḥ śikhibhiḥ samākulāḥ samutsukatvaṃ janayanti bhūdharāḥ // KalRs_2.16 //
GK19kalrs_pu:91: sasīkarāmbhodharasaṅgaśītalaḥ samīraṇaḥ kaṃ na karoti sotsukam // KalRs_2.17 //
GK19kalrs_pu:93: stanaiḥ sahārairvadanaiḥ sasīdhubhiḥ striyo ratiṃ saṃjanayanti kāminām // KalRs_2.18 //
GK19kalrs_pu:94: vahanti varṣanti nadanti bhānti vyāyanti nṛtyanti samāśrayanti /
GK19kalrs_pu:95: nadyo ghanā mattagajā vanāntāḥ priyāvihīnāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ // KalRs_2.19 //
GK19kalrs_pu:97: striyaśca kāñcīmaṇikuṇḍalojjvalā haranti ceto yugapatpravāsinām // KalRs_2.20 //
GK19kalrs_pu:98: mālāḥ kadambanavakesaraketakībhir āyojitāḥ śirasi bibhrati yoṣito 'dya /
GK19kalrs_pu:101: śrutvā dhvaniṃ jalamucāṃ tvaritaṃ pradoṣe śayyāgṛhaṃ gurugṛhātpraviśanti nāryaḥ // KalRs_2.22 //
GK19kalrs_pu:102: kuvalayadalanīlair unnatais toyanamrair mṛdupavanavidhūtair mandamandaṃ caladbhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:103: apahṛtamiva cetastoyadaiḥ sendracāpaiḥ pathikajanavadhūnāṃ tadviyogākulānām // KalRs_2.23 //
GK19kalrs_pu:104: mudita iva kadambairjātapuṣpaiḥ samantāt pavanacalitaśākhaiḥ śākhibhirnṛtyatīva /
GK19kalrs_pu:105: hasitamiva vidhatte sūcibhiḥ ketakīnāṃ navasalilaniṣekacchinnatāpo vanāntaḥ // KalRs_2.24 //
GK19kalrs_pu:107: vikacanavakadambaiḥ karṇapūraṃ vadhūnāṃ racayati jaladaughaḥ kāntavatkāla eṣaḥ // KalRs_2.25 //
GK19kalrs_pu:111: janitaruciragandhaḥ ketakīnāṃ rajobhiḥ pariharati nabhasvān proṣitānāṃ manāṃsi // KalRs_2.27 //
GK19kalrs_pu:113: atiśayaparuṣābhir grīṣmavahneḥ śikhābhiḥ samupajanitatāpaṃ hlādayantīva vindhyam // KalRs_2.28 //
GK19kalrs_pu:115: jaladasamaya eṣa prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūto diśatu tava hitāni prāyaśo vāñchitāni // KalRs_2.29 //
GK19kalrs_pu:119: kāśair mahī śiśiradīdhitinā rajanyo haṃsairjalāni saritāṃ kumudaiḥ sarāṃsi /
GK19kalrs_pu:120: saptacchadaiḥ kusumabhāranatairvanāntāḥ śuklīkṛtānyupavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ // KalRs_3.2 //
GK19kalrs_pu:122: nadyo viśālapulināntanitambabimbā mandaṃ prayānti samadāḥ pramadā ivādya // KalRs_3.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:124: saṃlakṣyate pavanavegacalaiḥ payodai rājeva cāmaraśatair upavījyamānaḥ // KalRs_3.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:125: bhinnāñjanapracayakānti nabho manojñaṃ bandhūkapuṣparajasāruṇitā ca bhūmiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:126: vaprāśca pakvakalamāvṛtabhūmibhāgāḥ protkaṇṭhayanti na mano bhuvi kasya yūnaḥ // KalRs_3.5 //
GK19kalrs_pu:128: mattadvirephaparipītamadhuprasekaś cittaṃ vidārayati kasya na kovidāraḥ // KalRs_3.6 //
GK19kalrs_pu:130: jyotsnādukūlamamalaṃ rajanī dadhānā vṛddhiṃ prayātyanudinaṃ pramadeva bālā // KalRs_3.7 //
GK19kalrs_pu:132: kurvanti haṃsavirutaiḥ parito janasya prītiṃ saroruharajo 'ruṇitās taṭinyaḥ // KalRs_3.8 //
GK19kalrs_pu:136: utphullapaṅkajavanāṃ nalinīṃ vidhunvan nyūnāṃ manaścalayati prasabhaṃ nabhasvān // KalRs_3.10 //
GK19kalrs_pu:138: mandaprabhātapavanodgatavīcimālāny utkaṇṭhayanti sahasā hṛdayaṃ sarāṃsi // KalRs_3.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:139: naṣṭaṃ dhanurbalabhido jaladodareṣu saudāminī sphurati nādya viyatpatākā /
GK19kalrs_pu:140: dhunvanti pakṣapavanairna nabho balākāḥ paśyanti nonnatamukhā gaganaṃ mayūrāḥ // KalRs_3.12 //
GK19kalrs_pu:148: haṃsaiḥ sasārasakulaiḥ pratināditāni sīmāntarāṇi janayanti nṛṇāṃ pramodam // KalRs_3.16 //
GK19kalrs_pu:150: nīlotpalairmadakalāni vilocanāni bhrūvibhramāśca rucirās tanubhis taraṃgaiḥ // KalRs_3.17 //
GK19kalrs_pu:151: śyāmā latāḥ kusumabhāranatapravālāḥ strīṇāṃ haranti dhṛtabhūṣaṇabāhukāntim /
GK19kalrs_pu:154: karṇeṣu ca pravarakāñcanakuṇḍaleṣu nīlotpalāni vividhāni niveśayanti // KalRs_3.19 //
GK19kalrs_pu:155: hāraiḥ sacandanarasaiḥ stanamaṇḍalāni śroṇītaṭaṃ suvipulaṃ rasanākalāpaiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:156: pādāmbujāni kalanūpuraśekharaiśca nāryaḥ prahṛṣṭamanaso 'dya vibhūṣayanti // KalRs_3.20 //
GK19kalrs_pu:158: śriyamatiśayarūpāṃ vyoma toyāśayānāṃ vahati vigatameghaṃ candratārāvakīrṇam // KalRs_3.21 //
GK19kalrs_pu:159: śaradi kumudasaṅgādvāyavo vānti śītā vigatajaladavṛndā digvibhāgā manojñāḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:160: vigatakaluṣamambhaḥ śyānapaṅkā dharitrī vimalakiraṇacandraṃ vyoma tārāvicitram // KalRs_3.22 //
GK19kalrs_pu:162: racitakusumagandhi prāyaśo yānti veśma prabalamadanahetostyaktasaṃgītarāgāḥ // KalRs_3.23 //
GK19kalrs_pu:163: suratarasavilāsāḥ satsakhībhiḥ sametā asamaśaravinodaṃ sūcayanti prakāmam /
GK19kalrs_pu:164: anupamamukharāgā rātrimadhye vinodaṃ śaradi taruṇakāntāḥ sūcayanti pramodān // KalRs_3.24 //
GK19kalrs_pu:165: divasakaramayūkhair bādhyamānaṃ prabhāte varayuvatimukhābhaṃ paṅkajaṃ jṛmbhate 'dya /
GK19kalrs_pu:166: kumudamapi gate 'staṃ līyate candrabimbe hasitamiva vadhūnāṃ proṣiteṣu priyeṣu // KalRs_3.25 //
GK19kalrs_pu:168: adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ // KalRs_3.26 //
GK19kalrs_pu:169: strīṇāṃ vihāya vadaneṣu śaśāṅkalakṣmīṃ kāmyaṃ ca haṃsavacanaṃ maṇinūpureṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:170: bandhūkakāntimadhareṣu manohareṣu kvāpi prayāti subhagā śaradāgamaśrīḥ // KalRs_3.27 //
GK19kalrs_pu:172: kumudarucirakāntiḥ kāminīvonmadeyaṃ pratidiśatu śaradvaścetasaḥ prītimagryām // KalRs_3.28 //
GK19kalrs_pu:178: na bāhuyugmeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ prayānti saṅgaṃ valayāṅgadāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:179: nitambabimbeṣu navaṃ dukūlaṃ tanvaṃśukaṃ pīnapayodhareṣu // KalRs_4.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:180: kāñcīguṇaiḥ kāñcanaratnacitrair no bhūṣayanti pramadā nitambān /
GK19kalrs_pu:181: na nūpurairhaṃsarutaṃ bhajadbhiḥ pādāmbujāny ambujakāntibhāñji // KalRs_4.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:183: śirāṃsi kālāgurudhūpitāni kurvanti nāryaḥ suratotsavāya // KalRs_4.5 //
GK19kalrs_pu:185: hasanti noccair daśanāgrabhinnān prapīḍyamānān adharān avekṣya // KalRs_4.6 //
GK19kalrs_pu:191: prasannatoyāni suśītalāni sarāṃsi cetāṃsi haranti puṃsām // KalRs_4.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:194: pākaṃ vrajantī himajātaśītair ādhūyamānā satataṃ marudbhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:195: priye priyaṅguḥ priyaviprayuktā vipāṇḍutāṃ yāti vilāsinīva // KalRs_4.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:201: dantacchadaṃ priyatamena nipītasāraṃ dantāgrabhinnam avakṛṣya nirīkṣate ca // KalRs_4.14 //
GK19kalrs_pu:206: anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā /
GK19kalrs_pu:209: saṃhṛṣyamāṇapulakorupayodharāntā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ // KalRs_4.18 //
GK19kalrs_pu:211: vinipatitatuṣāraḥ krauñcanādopagītaḥ pradiśatu himayuktaḥ kāla eṣaḥ sukhaṃ vaḥ // KalRs_4.19 //
GK19kalrs_pu:214: prakāmakāmaṃ pramadājanapriyaṃ varoru kālaṃ śiśirāhvayaṃ śṛṇu // KalRs_5.1 //
GK19kalrs_pu:216: gurūṇi vāsāṃsyabalāḥ sayauvanāḥ prayānti kāle 'tra janasya sevyatām // KalRs_5.2 //
GK19kalrs_pu:217: na candanaṃ candramarīciśītalaṃ na harmyapṛṣṭhaṃ śaradindunirmalam /
GK19kalrs_pu:218: na vāyavaḥ sāndratuṣāraśītalā janasya cittaṃ ramayanti sāmpratam // KalRs_5.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:220: vipāṇḍutārāgaṇacārubhūṣaṇā janasya sevyā na bhavanti rātrayaḥ // KalRs_5.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:224: nirīkṣya bhartṝn suratābhilāṣiṇaḥ striyo 'parādhānsamadā visasmaruḥ // KalRs_5.6 //
GK19kalrs_pu:226: bhramanti mandaṃ śramakheditoravaḥ kṣapāvasāne navayauvanāḥ striyaḥ // KalRs_5.7 //
GK19kalrs_pu:228: niveśitāntaḥ kusumaiḥ śiroruhair vibhūṣayantīva himāgamaṃ striyaḥ // KalRs_5.8 //
GK19kalrs_pu:230: vilāsinībhiḥ paripīḍitorasaḥ svapanti śītaṃ paribhūya kāminaḥ // KalRs_5.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:232: niśāsu hṛṣṭā saha kāmibhiḥ striyaḥ pibanti madyaṃ madanīyamuttamam // KalRs_5.10 //
GK19kalrs_pu:234: priyatamaparibhuktaṃ vīkṣamāṇā svadehaṃ vrajati śayanavāsādvāsamanyaṃ hasantī // KalRs_5.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:236: tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyā uṣasi śayanamanyā kāminī cāruśobhām // KalRs_5.12 //
GK19kalrs_pu:238: uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito 'dya // KalRs_5.13 //
GK19kalrs_pu:240: suratasamayaveṣaṃ naiśamāśu prahāya dadhati divasayogyaṃ veśamanyāstaruṇyaḥ // KalRs_5.14 //
GK19kalrs_pu:241: nakhapadacitabhāgān vīkṣamāṇāḥ stanāntān adharakisalayāgraṃ dantabhinnaṃ spṛśantyaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:244: priyajanarahitānāṃ citasaṃtāpahetuḥ śiśirasamaya eṣa śreyase vo 'stu nityam // KalRs_5.16 //
GK19kalrs_pu:247: manāṃsi bhettuṃ surataprasaṅgināṃ vasantayoddhā samupāgataḥ priye // KalRs_6.1 //
GK19kalrs_pu:248: drumāḥ sapuṣpāḥ salilaṃ sapadmaṃ striyaḥ sakāmāḥ pavanaḥ sugandhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:249: sukhāḥ pradoṣā divasāśca ramyāḥ sarvaṃ priye cārutaraṃ vasante // KalRs_6.2 //
GK19kalrs_pu:251: kurvanti nāryo 'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ // KalRs_6.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:253: cūtadrumāṇāṃ kusumānvitānāṃ dadāti saubhāgyamayaṃ vasantaḥ // KalRs_6.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:257: puṣpaṃ ca phullaṃ navamallikāyāḥ prayānti kāntiṃ pramadājanānām // KalRs_6.6 //
GK19kalrs_pu:258: staneṣu hārāḥ sitacandanārdrā bhujeṣu saṅgaṃ valayāṅgadāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:263: samīpavartiṣvadhunā priyeṣu samutsukā eva bhavanti nāryaḥ // KalRs_6.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:266: chāyāṃ janaḥ samabhivāñchati pādapānāṃ naktaṃ tathecchati punaḥ kiraṇaṃ sudhāṃśoḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:267: harmyaṃ prayāti śayituṃ sukhaśītalaṃ ca kāntāṃ ca gāḍhamupagūhati śītalatvāt // KalRs_6.11 //
GK19kalrs_pu:268: netreṣu lolo madirālaseṣu gaṇḍeṣu pāṇḍuḥ kaṭhinaḥ staneṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:269: madhyeṣu nimno jaghaneṣu pīnaḥ strīṇāmanaṅgo bahudhā sthito 'dya // KalRs_6.12 //
GK19kalrs_pu:271: bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām // KalRs_6.13 //
GK19kalrs_pu:273: ālipyate candanam aṅganābhir madālasābhir mṛganābhiyuktam // KalRs_6.14 //
GK19kalrs_pu:274: gurūṇi vāsāṃsi vihāya tūrṇaṃ tanūni lākṣārasarañjitāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:276: puṃskokilaś cūtarasāsavena mattaḥ priyāṃ cumbati rāgahṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:277: kūjaddvirephāpyayam ambujasthaḥ priyaṃ priyāyāḥ prakaroti cāṭu // KalRs_6.16 //
GK19kalrs_pu:279: kurvanti kāmaṃ pavanāvadhūtāḥ paryutsukaṃ mānasamaṅganānām // KalRs_6.17 //
GK19kalrs_pu:281: kurvantyaśokā hṛdayaṃ saśokaṃ nirīkṣyamāṇā navayauvanānām // KalRs_6.18 //
GK19kalrs_pu:283: kurvanti kāmimanasāṃ sahasotsukatvaṃ bālātimuktalatikāḥ samavekṣyamāṇāḥ // KalRs_6.19 //
GK19kalrs_pu:285: dṛṣṭvā priye sahṛdayasya bhavenna kasya kandarpabāṇapatanavyathitaṃ hi cetaḥ // KalRs_6.20 //
GK19kalrs_pu:287: sadyo vasantasamayena samāciteyaṃ raktāṃśukā navavadhūriva bhāti bhūmiḥ // KalRs_6.21 //
GK19kalrs_pu:288: kiṃ kiṃśukaiḥ śukamukhacchavibhirna bhinnaṃ kiṃ karṇikārakusumairna kṛtaṃ nu dagdham /
GK19kalrs_pu:289: yatkokilaḥ punarayaṃ madhurairvacobhir yūnāṃ manaḥ suvadanānihitaṃ nihanti // KalRs_6.22 //
GK19kalrs_pu:291: lajjānvitaṃ savinayaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṣaṇena paryākulaṃ kulagṛhe 'pi kṛtaṃ vadhūnām // KalRs_6.23 //
GK19kalrs_pu:293: vāyur vivāti hṛdayāni harannarāṇāṃ nīhārapātavigamātsubhago vasante // KalRs_6.24 //
GK19kalrs_pu:295: cittaṃ munerapi haranti nivṛttarāgaṃ prāgeva rāgamalināni manāṃsi yūnām // KalRs_6.25 //
GK19kalrs_pu:297: māse madhau madhurakokilabhṛṅganādair nāryā haranti hṛdayaṃ prasabhaṃ narāṇām // KalRs_6.26 //
GK19kalrs_pu:299: śaileyajālapariṇaddhaśilātalāntān dṛṣṭvā janaḥ kṣitibhṛto mudameti sarvaḥ // KalRs_6.27 //
GK19kalrs_pu:300: netre nimīlayati roditi yāti śokaṃ ghrāṇaṃ kareṇa viruṇaddhi virauti coccaiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:302: samadamadhukarāṇāṃ kokilānāṃ ca nādaiḥ kusumitasahakāraiḥ karṇikāraiś ca ramyaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:303: iṣubhiriva sutīkṣṇairmānasaṃ māninīnāṃ tudati kusumamāso manmathoddīpanāya // KalRs_6.29 //
GK19kalrs_pu:305: abhimukhamabhivīkṣya kṣāmadeho 'pi mārge madanaśaranighātair mohameti pravāsī // KalRs_6.30 //
GK19kalrs_pu:307: karakisalayakāntiṃ pallavairvidrumābhair upahasati vasantaḥ kāminīnāmidānīm // KalRs_6.31 //
GK19kalrs_pu:309: madajanitavilāsair dṛṣṭipātair munīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān // KalRs_6.32 //
GK19kalrs_pu:310: madhusurabhi mukhābjaṃ locane lodhratāmre navakurabakapūrṇaḥ keśapāśo manojñaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:311: gurutarakucayugmaṃ śroṇibimbaṃ tathaiva na bhavati kimidānīṃ yoṣitāṃ manmathāya // KalRs_6.33 //
GK19kalrs_pu:313: utkūjitaiḥ parabhṛtasya madākulasya śrotrapriyairmadhukarasya ca gītanādaiḥ // KalRs_6.34 //
GK19kalrs_pu:314: ramyaḥ pradoṣasamayaḥ sphuṭacandrabhāsaḥ puṃskokilasya virutaṃ pavanaḥ sugandhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:315: mattāliyūthavirutaṃ niśi sīdhupānaṃ sarvaṃ rasāyanamidaṃ kusumāyudhasya // KalRs_6.35 //
GK19kalrs_pu:317: cūtāmodasugandhimandapavanaḥ śṛṅgāradīkṣāguruḥ kalpāntaṃ madanapriyo diśatu vaḥ puṣpāgamo maṅgalam // KalRs_6.36 //
GK19kalrs_pu:319: vividhamadhupayūthair veṣṭyamānaḥ samantād bhavatu tava vasantaḥ śreṣṭhakālaḥ sukhāya // KalRs_6.37 //
GK19kalrs_pu:320: āmrī mañjulamañjarī varaśaraḥ satkiṃśukaṃ yaddhanur jyā yasyālikulaṃ kalaṅkarahitaṃ chattraṃ sitāṃśuḥ sitam /
GK19kalrs_pu:321: mattebho malayānilaḥ parabhṛtā yadbandino lokajit so 'yaṃ vo vitarītarītu vitanurbhadraṃ vasantānvitaḥ // KalRs_6.38 //
